short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: simple colour picker that picks colours from webpages, which assists users in extracting colours displayed on any website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension that picks colours from webpages is a useful tool designed to assist users in capturing and extracting colours displayed on any website. By simply activating the extension, users can activate a colour picker tool that allows them to click on any element on the webpage and obtain the corresponding colour value.
